episodes.title: #002 - Eden Moody
episodes.description: In a stark and emotional conversation hosted around a cosy bonfire, Eden Moody talks about her life-changing experience of escaping from a notorious cult Children of God and her struggles of surviving through it. Eden shares how her foray into music helped her overcome the experience and started offering her a means to heal. She discusses the importance of forgiveness, curiosity, and the power of joy in transforming one's life. Dealing with depression and other mental health struggles, her journey to faith, and the role of determination, inspiration and faith in her journey towards personal freedom, are discussed in detail. Timestamps (00:00) Eden Moody (00:10) Introduction and Setting the Scene (01:22) Discussing Personal Style and Fashion (04:59) Unveiling a Dark Past: Growing Up in a Cult (06:12) The Journey to Freedom and Self-Discovery (18:04) The Power of Music and Reinvention (21:05) Understanding Freedom and Overcoming Shame (36:48) Understanding the Downward Spiral (36:52) The Impact of Shame and Conviction (37:06) Personal Stories of Loss and Struggle (37:39) Escaping the Mental Cult (38:58) The Power of Retraining Your Mind (39:19) The Journey of Overcoming Depression (39:38) The Process of Transformation (40:14) The Importance of Baby Steps (40:46) The Role of Meditation and Observing Thoughts (43:13) The Power of Choice and Love (44:46) The Importance of Self-Love (57:11) The Power of Forgiveness (01:02:09) The Journey of Faith and Transformation (01:04:44) The Power of Grace and the Gospel (01:09:00) The Importance of Curiosity and Love (01:09:53) Final Thoughts and Contact Information
